alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 8:04AM EST until December 13 at 12:46AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Augusta. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Much of the parking lot on Front Street in Augusta floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:48 AM EST Monday the stage was 5.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will reach flood stage later this afternoon with a maximum value of 16.1 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
